Rebel Inc. Update 1 - The First of Many
I'm thrilled to say that the launch of Rebel Inc. has been a stunning success. Thank you so much for all your support! This update* adds a highly requested feature, some new decisions, and a number of quality of life improvements and bug fixes:

Fully customisable Operation names
- The existing Operation name generator has been enhanced and you can now also name your operation anything you want (we had hundreds of emails asking for this!).

New decisions and events
- e.g. A major international power may decide to initiate a military Surge to help stabilise the region. However, everyone knows the soldiers won't stick around for ever. Maybe you should ask for something else...?

Fixes and quality of life improvements
- Fixed a rare issue where stability would change to NAN (we didn't anticipate players generating so quite so much hostility!)
- Fixed issue that sometimes made music volume too low
- Fixed rare issue when game would think a cheat was active when it wasn't
- Improved button hit-boxes to make them easier to tap on certain devices
- Fixed an issue that sometimes prevented achievements from synchronising properly
- Fixed various typos, optimised performance and other minor bug fixes

FYI: we're currently hard at work on the first big content update which will add a new map and governor, language localisation and more! Let me know what else you would like to see in the future.
James

*We weren't actually planning on doing a proper update before Christmas - but didn't want to keep everyone waiting! :P

Rebel Inc. Update 2 - Operational Advisors and new languages

1. Operational Advisors - discover 30 unique experts as you play and hire them at the start of a game to customise your Operation. A Tribal Elder will delay the insurgency but a Chef will improve Coalition soldier morale. A Tax Collector would increase your budget but maybe you just want a Trained Monkey to make the difficult decisions for you...?

2. New languages added! Rebel Inc. is now fully localised in French, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Italian, Korean, Japanese, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Russian

3. Lots of minor improvements and bug fixes

FYI: we're currently hard at work on the next update which adds a new map and governor. You can find some clues in the game now :) Let me know what else you would like to see in the future.
James

Rebel Inc. Update 3 - The Tanks and Caves expansion

New map: Black Caves - this region is infamous for its imposing mountain range, riddled with underground cave networks. Insurgents will use these to hide and regroup, leaving towns and farms along the river under constant threat.

New Governor: Tank Commander - Equip your soldiers with tanks! Tanks are extremely powerful but have limited mobility. If only the Insurgents would stay where you want them to...

Command Pack IAP added - this ‘season pass’ unlocks all standard and special maps/governors (including future). You can also unlock the expansion for free by beating the whole game on Brutal difficulty.

We’ve also added lots of content, balance, and quality of life improvements which are available for free including deserting soldiers, luxury hotel construction, and improved zone and insurgent AI. There’s also a new settings option to reduce the number of pop-ups in game.

We’ve got loads of ideas for new maps, governors and more still to come so let us know what you would most like to see!

James

Rebel Inc. Update 4 - The Azure Dam expansion

New map: Azure Dam - Rebuild a vast dam to prevent catastrophic floods and ensure stability in this arid region. Protect vulnerable supply convoys en route to the dam site, but beware - Insurgents forces will launch aggressive raids to destroy them!

New Governor: Development Director - This skilled micromanager deploys civilian experts to prioritise zones for development and rapidly stabilise key parts of the region. High performance: delivered!

All new civilian ‘concerns’ mechanic - Wondering how to best win hearts and minds? Now you can gather intel on zones to discover if civilians need specific initiatives. Strategise and stabilise on a whole new level!

Numerous balance tweaks, fixes and improvements including further AI enhancements.

As for the future, we’ve got a whole bunch more ideas for new maps, governors and more still to come. Let us know what you would most like to see!

James

New Difficulty: Mega-Brutal - For those that think Brutal is Casual, we’ve added an entirely new difficulty to sink your teeth into.

Mega-Brutal adds new local concerns around road quality and security, lets insurgents lash out in desperation and adds depth to peace negotiations.

As for the future, we’ve got new modes, maps, governors and more still to come. Let us know what you would most like to see!

New Campaign Mode: Get ready to conduct large-scale operations across multiple regions to bring peace to an entire country. Develop unique tactics and manage resources in a persistent world with all new map features and overcome radically different strategic challenges.

Adaptive Insurgency: As the campaign goes on, the Insurgents will learn devastating new tactics to challenge you. Sleeper cells, ambushes or even swimming lessons (!) will radically change how they fight.

Powerful Tactics: Each region that you stabilise dramatically expands your abilities and resources. Sniper support, advance development experts, indestructible garrisons, or even removing all corruption in the region open up all kinds of strategic opportunities.

Dynamic Maps: New procedural map features mean every map is different. Regions can contain Crime Syndicates, Armed Supporters, No-Fly Zones or even Soviet Bunkers! The combinations are endless.

Fixes: Numerous balance tweaks, fixes and improvements including further AI enhancements!

We'll be updating Campaign mode with more Map Features and Tactics in the future, if you have any ideas, be sure to get in touch.

Rebel Inc 1.7 - The Challenge Update
New Weekly Challenge game mode added!

- Join players worldwide to tackle a special region with unique insurgent tactics, terrain features and operation parameters. Develop the perfect strategy to take on both Standard and Brutal operations. New challenges deployed every week on Wednesday!
- Added a total of over 150 Map Features, Player Tactics and Insurgent Tactics to Campaign, also available in Weekly Challenge, including Private Military Contractors, Soviet Bunkers, Propaganda Teams, Oil Surveys and More!
- Various bug fixes, quality of life improvements and balance changes

Rebel Inc 1.8 - New Region - Opium Trail

New Region Added - Opium Trail

Locals in this secluded river valley depend upon opium farming to survive, but so do the insurgents...

- Develop unique new strategies to counter the opium trade
- Locate and destroy poppy fields to weaken the insurgents
- Work with the local population to help them find alternative sources of income
- Make decisions featuring powerful kingpins, opium traffickers and protesting farmers
- Enjoy beautiful new Advisor portraits
